CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. DTP (mentioned in the phrase "DTP-containing copolymers")
2. PC 70 BM (mentioned in the phrase "PC 70 BM showed a short-circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1")

Therefore, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

DTP
PC 70 BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. DTP

So, the only material name mentioned in the paragraph is:

DTP

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTP |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PSCs (Photovoltaic Cells)
2. DTP (Dithiol Terephthalate)
3. PC 70 BM (Polystyrene Copolymer with 70% Butadiene)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities that refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph:

1. DTP (Dithiol Terephthalate) - a material property
2. PC 70 BM (Polystyrene Copolymer with 70% Butadiene) - a material property

So, the two material properties mentioned in the paragraph are:

DTP
PC 70 BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| DTP |
| PC 70 BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. Short-circuit current (mA cm^-1) - This is the value of the current that flows through the photovoltaic device when it is connected in a short circuit.
2. 22.6 mA cm^-1 - This is the specific value of the short-circuit current measured in the previous study.
3. Photovoltaic performance - This is a general term that refers to the overall efficiency and effectiveness of a photovoltaic device in converting sunlight into electrical energy.

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. Short-circuit current (mA cm^-1)
2. 22.6 mA cm^-1
3. Photovoltaic performance
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. 22.6 mA cm^-1 - This is the value of the short-circuit current measured in the previous study.

So, the only entity that refers to the value of a material property in the paragraph is:

1. 22.6 mA cm^-1

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 22.6 mA cm^-1 |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
